required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Two Dose Levels of DFN-15 vs. Placebo in Patients With Migraine Headaches
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Crossover Study Evaluating Efficacy of DFN-15 in Patients With Migraine Headache With or Without Aura

brief_summary.textblock: Crossover study of DFN-15 dose A versus DFN-15 dose B versus Placebo in the treatment of migraine headaches.

primary_outcome.measure: Pain Free, defined as a score of "0" on a numerical scale of "0" to "3"
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of subjects who are migraine headache free at 2 hours after taking study drug administration

facility.name: Clinvest/ A Division of Banyan Group, Inc.

results_reference.citation: Munjal S, Bennett A. Efficacy and safety of DFN-15, an oral liquid formulation of celecoxib, in adults with migraine: a multicenter, randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blind, crossover study. Neuropsychiatr Dis Treat. 2017 Nov 7;13:2797-2802. doi: 10.2147/NDT.S151834. eCollection 2017.
